description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The Spoids have invaded the planetary spectrum. We have received distress calls from the surrounding planets in our galaxy.  In this epic and unique defense game, travel from planet to planet and control the defense systems against an endless swarm of Spoids. Can you stop the Spoids?
